item.title: Pence reveals words exchanged with President-elect Trump at Carter funeral
item.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence recently revealed the words he exchanged with President-elect Trump at the funeral for late President Carter.

item.title: Dem senator warns 'LA fires are preview of coming atrocities,' claims Trump bought off by 'Big Oil'
item.description: Sen. Ed Markey, D-Mass., claims President-elect Trump was bought off by "Big Oil" and that "the LA fires are preview of coming atrocities."

item.title: Newsom invites Trump to California, urges against politicizing 'human tragedy,' disseminating 'disinformation'
item.description: As fires rage, California Gov. Gavin Newsom invited President-elect Trump to visit the state, urging against politicization of the catastrophe.

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith resigns after 2-year stint at Department of Justice
item.description: Special counsel Jack Smith left his position at the Department of Justice Friday, according to a court document filed Saturday. He was hired by Merric...

item.title: Trump announces new Cabinet deputies as inauguration date draws near
item.description: President-elect Trump announced five new nominations in a series of Truth Social posts Saturday, including four who plan to serve as deputies to Cabin...
